word: H6670 - צָהַל - tsâhal - tsaw-hal' - Bellow - கனை

sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - ஆர்ப்பரி, கனை, பூரி, சத்தமிடு, களையை உண்டு பண்ணு, உயர்த்து
1) to neigh, to cry out in a shrill - like manner
a) to neigh (used of men as stallions, figurative)
b) (Piel) to cry out in a shrill - like way (in distress)

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; to gleam, that is, (figuratively) be cheerful; by transference, to sound clear (of various animal or human expressions): - bellow, cry aloud (out), lift up, neigh, rejoice, make to shine, shout.
Cognate: H4684, H6670
